snippet.title: Spell Candle Teaser-Trailer | Shed Light on the Truth
snippet.description:
#SpellCandle #indiegame #visualnovel 
Wishlist Spell Candle on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3154490/Spell_Candle/?beta=0

Spell Candle is a mystery romance-fantasy visual novel worked on by a small team of independent talent in order to be fully funded through Kickstarter early next year! 

The game is an exploration of grief through the mediums of Faith, Hope, and Love and the meanings of those terms in character form. Carefully solve the mystery of events that sent Omnis, City of Candlewax, into disarray and convince the Elven Aspects of your innocence.
Discover the truth?  Fall in love?  Or meet your maker? Light a candle and peer into the shadows that obscure the truth. Where do you draw your strength from?

Follow the Bottled Monster Ink studio on the following social media profiles:
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bottledmonsterink
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bottledmonsterink/
X: https://x.com/BottledMonsters
Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/bottledmonsterink
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bottled-monster-ink/

Credits:
Music by Zahari Zahariev and BigBiteRecords 
Editing by Studio Junak

All rights to this video belong to Bottled Monster Ink.
